summary: A self-motivated professional with a dynamic personality and more than eight years of experience in management, finance, administration, advisory, translation, and tutoring. Has worked with reputable international organizations over the last five years in various roles. Proficient in Dari, Persian and Pashto; also proficient in English, Russian, Arabic and Urdu.

experience.title: Finance & Admin Manager
experience.description: Identified staff vacancies and recruited, interviewed and selected applicants. Conducted new employee orientation to foster positive attitude toward organizational objectives. Advised managers on organizational policy matters and recommended changes. Prepared contracts, subsidies, financial agreements, suppliers, services, and consultancies; prepared program budget planning; maintained accurate cash records; ensured procurement is completed in accordance with financial policies and procedures; prepared monthly reconciliation of cash, financial monitoring, accounting and financial plans. Supervised a team of over 15 employees.

experience.title: Advisor & Interpreter/Translator
experience.description: Translated conversations from Dari to English and vice versa; organized trips and meetings; traveled around Mazar Districts; interviewed women; observed the women’s situation in rural areas; prepared reports for fundraising.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Worked in Credit Banking and Accounting departments; maintained records and accounts for bank transactions; reported monthly financial statements; prepared daily reconciliation of customer accounts.

experience.title: Assistant - Voluntarily
experience.description: Communicated with national and international staff; organized trips; supported finance issues; arranged official meetings, conferences, and other events.

experience.title: Tutor
experience.description: Applied required teaching methods for students; received training on introduction to GIZ financial administration; participated in training on financial administration, procurement, O&R regulation and internal control; engaged in time management, communication, and team-building trainings; participated in risk management information portal training.
